creator: amar.darisa@gmail.com
text:
Version - r1782296

I see following warning messages showing up during my load run. What can i change to make it go away ?

Jul 06, 2017 11:47:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:47:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:47:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:47:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:48:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:48:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:48:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:48:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:49:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:49:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:49:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:49:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:50:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:50:22 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld
WARNING: Couldn't flush user prefs: java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException: Couldn't get file lock.
Jul 06, 2017 11:50:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences checkLockFile0ErrorCode
WARNING: Could not lock User prefs.  Unix error code 24.
Jul 06, 2017 11:50:52 AM java.util.prefs.FileSystemPreferences syncWorld

There is not enough information in this entry, but I believe it is not a JMeter problem, but rather a setup problem (probably no writable home directory).

For similar cases with other java programs see:

https://developer.ibm.com/answers/questions/194298/why-i-see-a-prefs-message-in-my-appserver-systemou.html

https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirakb/could-not-lock-user-prefs-unix-error-code-2-270829588.html

Please discuss this problem on the users mailing list, if it is not solved by the links above.
creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
